package.name: turkish-accent
package.author: Ender Ahmet Yurt
package.description: A simple package to convert English characters to Turkish.
package.title: Turkish Accent Package

manifest.author: Ender Ahmet Yurt
manifest.description: A simple package to convert English characters to Turkish.
manifest.name: turkish-accent
manifest.title: Turkish Accent Package

packageRepo.readme:
# Turkish Accent Espanso Package

A simple package to convert English characters to Turkish.

| Keyword | Replaced |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| :i            | ı   |
| :u            | ü     |
| :s            | ş     |
| :c            | ç   |
| :o            | ö     |
| :g            | ğ     |
| :I            | İ     |
| :U            | Ü     |
| :S            | Ş     |
| :C            | Ç     |
| :O            | Ö     |
| :G            | Ğ     |

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# turkish-accent

matches:
  - trigger: ":i"
    replace: "ı"
  - trigger: ":u"
    replace: "ü"
  - trigger: ":s"
    replace: "ş"
  - trigger: ":c"
    replace: "ç"
  - trigger: ":o"
    replace: "ö"
  - trigger: ":g"
    replace: "ğ"
  - trigger: ":I"
    replace: "İ"
  - trigger: ":U"
    replace: "Ü"
  - trigger: ":S"
    replace: "Ş"
  - trigger: ":C"
    replace: "Ç"
  - trigger: ":O"
    replace: "Ö"
  - trigger: ":G"
    replace: "Ğ"
